attributes.action: Prevent companies paying dividends unless all employees are paid the living wage
attributes.additional_details: The recent rise in the living wage will only affect 180000 UK citizens
attributes.background:
Prevent companies paying dividends to shareholders unless all employees are paid the living wage

This measure would allow smaller companies to grow, increase the amount of income tax paid, reduce workers dependency on state benefits  and reduce tax avoidance schemes

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament take specific action.

It is already illegal not to pay the National Living Wage. We are therefore unsure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.
